cast() - Method in class card.spell.BenedictionDePuissance
Override of the cast method of Spell Ask the player to select a target minion of his board give the selected minion +1 to attack
cast() - Method in class card.spell.Consecration
Override of the cast method of Spell Deal 2 damages to all the minions of the enemy board
cast() - Method in class card.spell.ExplosionDesArcanes
Override of the cast method of Spell Give 1 damage to all the enemy minion on the enemy board
cast() - Method in class card.spell.ImageMiroir
Override of the cast method of Spell Add two TokenImageMiroir to the player board
cast() - Method in class card.spell.MaitriseDeBlocage
Override of the cast method of Spell Add 5 point of armor to the player
cast() - Method in class card.spell.Metamorphose
Override of the cast method of Spell Ask the player to select a target minion on the enemy board remove the targeted minion and replace him by a sheep minion If there is no minions on the enemy board the spell is canceled
cast() - Method in class card.spell.Spell
abstract method cast
cast() - Method in class card.spell.Tourbillon
Override of the cast method of Spell Deal 1 damage to every minions on the board of each player
